command_description: Generate a Big Blue Button conference call.
bbb_url_description: The Url where BBB is running;
bbb_guest_policy_description: Will set the guest policy for the meeting. The guest policy determines whether or not users who send a join request with guest=true will be allowed to join the meeting. Possible values are ALWAYS_ACCEPT, ALWAYS_DENY, and ASK_MODERATOR.
bbb_register_hook_description: Register a Hook on BBB to close conference calls automatically when they end. Requires the `bbb-webhook` package.
bbb_additional_params_Description: Set the custom parameter for the bbb-client (https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/admin/customize.html#passing-custom-parameters-to-the-client-on-join). only parameter starts with 'userdata-bbb' used.
